cause.description:
NCC was started over 40 yrs ago by John Livingstone and a group of committed citizens acting together to protect our natural masterpieces through private action. That vision has since yielded astounding results: over 1.8 million acres of land including rare native grasslands, majestic centures-old forests and precious coastal and wetland habitats
www.natureconservancy.ca Ontario@natureconservancy.ca
1. conserving land
2. save local habitats
3. save coastal areas from development
cause.mission: help save the best of this country's wilderness
cause.name: Nature Conservancy of Canada
